::Bazooka/Magmatron::

    Searching the ship he could not find Bobertron, but he remembered he was 
going outside to talk to the guest. Bazooka new he would have to report to 
Magmatron, but he really didn't want to. But unnoticed be him there was a 
small chip implanted within his core processor, it would report the thoughts 
of this bot to Magmatron. Unfortunately it was the only one with Magmatron so 
he couldn't monitor the thoughts of the others.
    "Bazooka report to the lab ASAP," Magmatron said in to the comm. Bazooka 
ran to the Lab, no one was there. He ran to the second lab and only Magmatron 
was there. He was suddenly very nervous.
    Magmatron walked up to him smiling in an evil way. Grabbing him by the 
neck he slammed Bazooka down on to a chair.
    "Don't go anywhere," Magmatron said as titanium straps clamped down on 
Bazooka. "This will only take a short while."
    Magmatron hit a few buttons and the process began. Bazooka could feel the 
changes within him. Soon it became obvious that Magmatron had made a mistake. 
Instead of becoming a more powerful dinosaur he was changing into a shark!!
    Magmatron knew what must be done. He ran into another room and locked the 
Lab, he then flooded it with sea water. Trying to operate the controls from 
outside was difficult for him, a surge went through the water and Bazooka...
